game.title: Radical Graphics
game.description: Radical Graphics is an Indie Development Studio based in Amsterdam, Europe that designs and develops entertainment software such as Web Apps, Games and Gamification solutions. The studio is made up of Manuel González and José Gómez de Lara, two game industry veterans going indie to the exciting future : Unity, Ouya, Mobile, Web Apps, Gamification & Virtual Reality.

history.text: It all started by three friends at the end of XXth Century in a borrowed office space in Costa del Sol, Southern Spain.Radical Graphics Studios was founded as a moniker for naming their different projects . They, as courious kids tried to tinker with a wide range of stuff: web, shortfilm production, game development, mobile research, video, music, fashion, social networks (yes in 1999!), etc... These collaborations lead them to study Software Engineering at university. (in Spain.What a bunch of lucky guys...)
